titleInfo.title: 'Narrative of a Residence in Koordistan, and on the Site of Ancient Nineveh; with Journal of a Voyage down the Tigris to Bagdad and an Account of a Visit to Shirauz and Persepolis.'

physicalDescription.extent: This volume contains a table of contents giving chapter headings and page references. Each chapter heading is followed by a detailed breakdown of the contents of that chapter.

mods.abstract: Narrative of a Residence in Koordistan, and on the Site of Ancient Nineveh; with Journal of a Voyage down the Tigris to Bagdad and an Account of a Visit to Shirauz and Persepolis.Author: Claudius James Rich.Contributor: Mary Rich.Publication Details: London: James Duncan, Paternoster Row.Physical Description: initial Roman numeral pagination (i-viii); with map, plan and illustrations; octavo.
